name: Ares
text: On R: Gain +2 power for each enemy card here.

name: Artemis
text: On R: Gain +5 power if there is exactly one enemy card here.

name: Hera
text: On R: Give cards in your hand +1 power.

name: Demeter
text: On R: Both players draw a card.

name: Hercules
text: On R: Doubles its power if it's the strongest card here.

name: Ship of Theseus
text: On R: Add a copy with +1 power to your hand.

name: Sword of Damocles
text: EoT: Loses 1 power if not winning this location.

name: Midas
text: On R: Set ALL cards here to 3 power.

name: Apollo
text: On R: Gain +1 mana next turn.

name: Prometheus
text: On R: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.
